description: Making beer in Huntsville, Alabama! The Rocket City!    We are receiving some help from our friends at Blue Pants Brewing Brewery and will be contract brewing to start. We intend to move to full production soon thereafter!

name: Roundabout Brewery
description: Small small brewery focused on quality craft beer. Growler sales only at this time.
hoursOfOperation: Wed - Fri: 4:30 pm - 9:00 pm  Sat: 12:00 pm - 9:00 pm  Sun: 11:00 am - 1:00 pm

name: Rupert's Brew House
description: "Where Good Friends Meet" located in the historic Oakland Pharmacy in Kalamazoo, MI    We're a small boutique brewery featuring over 8 hand-crafted beers on tap. We're unique by offering live entertainment 6 nights a week and never a cover. BYOF (Bring Your Own Food) or order in for delivery by one of the many local food joints.    Experience the down home, relaxed atmosphere where the beer pours freely and there's never a cover. Make sure you visit Captn Stooby our mascot.
hoursOfOperation: 2 pm - 2 am

name: Rusty Beaver Brewery
description: Well this story starts about twenty years ago when Me and the Mrs. were a just a little younger. See the city life didn’t do it, neighbor’s too close or just plain freedom of the country, Something got us seeking a different path? We moved out from the Capital city to our new Beaver dam address, 30 acres with an old barn and a pond near here is home and home is good. Wouldn’t trade it for another pond anywhere! Peaceful country living, it feeds the soul, drink some in as you spend a little time with us.     We got busy, raised the little ones up, built a business and worked hard on the old homestead remembering to be grateful each day for the life we have carved out. What a long strange trip it has been so far! We have learned ambition and hard work get you where you want to go, it just takes some time and a lot of patience!     Austin and I Started brewing several years ago, we loved cooking together and drinking too so it was a natural progression. Brewing and sharing with friends our fresh all grain brews became an obsession for us. Our passion is to brew great local beers by sourcing the finest quality ingredients available and creating craft recipes that highlight the best qualities of those ingredients. Please stop by our brewery to enjoy the freshest beer available. After you have tried one we hope you will agree,“You never forget your first Beaver”
hoursOfOperation: Wed - Thu: 12:00 pm - 8:00 pm  Fri - Sat: 12:00 pm - 9:00 pm  Sun: 12:00 pm - 6:00 pm

name: Sanitas Brewing

name: Santa Clara Valley Brewing
description: Santa Clara Valley Brewing is a brewery in San Jose, CA.  Currently brewing under contract, we will be building our brewery early in 2014.

name: Saucony Creek Brewing Co.
description: Saucony Creek Brewing Company is a forward-thinking craft brewery proudly fashioning hyper-local beers from farm to pint in an effort to keep glass-clinking camaraderie alive and well. We’ve recognized that a truly spectacular beer possesses the power to erase all boundaries and unify individuals no matter what their differences may be.    In an industry where newbies continue to emerge and strive for originality, Saucony Creek Brewing Company is destined to break the mold with authentic, small-batch creations accented by an open-minded, “say we won’t” type of attitude. Despite our tiny town presence, there’s a world of passion and experience dripping from each Saucony sip.    It was a professional X Games and action sports career that sent a younger version of Saucony Creek Brewing Company’s current Founder and Owner, Matt Lindenmuth, hopping from country to country where artful inspiration, diverse cultures and unique individuals prevailed around every corner. He soaked it all up and particularly felt fascination for craft beer at the age of thirteen in Belgium. Fast forward through US Snowboard Team training, Guinness World Records, NBC’s Gravity Games and a collection of injuries,  it was time to leave behind one crafty career and begin another one. With some newfound free time, Matt took his long standing hobby of home brewing to the next level and began the formal process of launching Saucony Creek Brewing Company.

name: Schubros Brewery

name: Scratch Brewing Company
description: Scratch Brewing Company is a farmhouse brewery located 5 miles from the Shawnee National Forest in Ava, Illinois. The brewery focuses on farmhouse beers and other styles enhanced by the innovative addition of local ingredients, including: nettle, elderberry, ginger, dandelion, maple sap, hickory nuts, wild carrot seed, cedar, and others.

name: Second Salem Brewing Company

With over 20 years of brewing experience we produce craft beer in a variety of styles which we will proudly serve in our tasting room while guest can enjoy a front row seat to view the brewing process.

name: SlapShot Brewing Co.

name: Slate Creek Brewing Co.
description: Slate Creek is a little know tributary to the St. Joe River deep in the mountains of North Idaho. Hidden by steep rugged canyon walls, Slate Creek has long been a secret spot for anglers and whitewater explorers. Slate Creek Brewing Co., like the mountain stream it is named after, is a secret spot for craft beer explorers, serving up adventurous, rugged and beautifully hand crafted ales for those daring enough to explore the un-trampled path. Discover the secret spot in your own backyard.
hoursOfOperation: Thu - Sat: 2:00 pm - 10:00 pm

name: Smoke'n Hops
description: We are a locally owned company and group of friends who are very passionate about Texas BBQ, good Texas craft beers, and live music. We've had a vision of a business that could bring the very best in these things together, and now our vision has become reality. Smoke 'n Hops will brew our own beer on site, smoke our own Texas-style BBQ, and bring in prominent musicians as well as local acts with ties to the community. It is very important to us to tie these things in with a fun, family-oriented environment. Therefore we have installed a playground so the younger ones are having fun while the older ones are at play.

name: South Bend Brew Werks
description: Our mission is to “Build a stronger community, one brew at a time.” That means the community of brewers, of craft beer drinkers, of foodies, of local food producers, and of course, South Bend. We plan to celebrate and support South Bend, honoring its long heritage of brewing and food producing by making great beer and backing it up with locally sourced food. Sustainability is hard at work in South Bend and it’s a core tenet for us. Adaptive reuse is a philosophy we’re embracing fully and you’ll see it throughout our pub. We are fiercely proud of this city and it is an honor to have it as part of our name and be part of its renaissance.

name: Stoup Brewing
description: Stoup Brewing – The Art and Science of Beer    At Stoup, our craftsmanship is a testament to our commitment to the art and the science of beer. As scientists, we hold the microorganisms and chemical processes that create beer in the highest esteem. As artists, we revel in a good pour. The dual disposition honors traditional styles perfected by earlier brew-masters as well as elevates craft brewing by continually seeking a better pint.    Our brewery will communicate a respect for both the art and science of beer by cultivating a warm and communal environment – a place for friends to gather and for enthusiasts to chat with the brewers over a well-fashioned, delicious beer.

We think that’s a worthy goal, and one that only comes about by being open to the possibilities. It’s something we think about with the beers we brew and the things we do. (And when you join us, you will too.)  Welcome to a new Temperance movement.

It is a place were everyone is welcome; where a communal bond is formed.   The in-house 4 barrel brewing system will service as a means of providing quality beer for you and your neighbor. In the last decade, the demand for better beer has been on the rise, and the customer is becoming more discerning in their tastes. Our aim is to provide a local craft brew that we, as a community, can be proud of, and to showcase some of the ever increasing number of great Tampa area breweries!

name: Timeless Pints Brewing Company
description: Lakewood's first microbrewery!     On Father's Day, several years ago, my son and I purchased a home brewing kit for my husband. As an Engineer and a lover of craft beer, he was excited to experiment with his own concoctions. Since his first trial run, he's produced multiple variety of stouts, ales, lagers and IPA's as well as very happy friends, family and neighbors. His love for the unique keeps him constantly in search of "new and different" ingredients and the hope of a perfect combination.    One hot July evening, some friends disclosed they were embarking on a new restaurant idea. They asked Chris (my husband) if he would brew the beer specifically for their new endeavor. The ABC frowns on beer sold without the proper licensing and selling from the kitchen counter is not a viable option. Thus a new venture began.    What was once a dream is now a reality and we can now bring our own craft beer to our local Lakewood/Long Beach community. You'll find us just behind the Long Beach Airport.

Verboten opened in 2013 and in 2014 took home two World Beer Cup medals.     Carefully handcrafted from conception until our brew fills your glass, Verboten provides an endlessly exciting journey for craft beer lovers. Our tagline is "Beer for All," and we believe there is a perfect beer out there for everyone.

name: Westminster Brewing Co
description: Imagine a little, community-focused brewery looking to make   thirsty neighbors and friends a great product, then find it tucked   away in a casual, friendly setting and you are at the Westminster   Brewing Company! Located in our namesake city on the Front   Range of awesome Colorado, this production brewery's main   objective is to serve our community and help craft beer fans,   both seasoned and the newly initiated, find the varieties and   flavors they desire.

name: Wicks Brewing Co
description: Wicks Brewing Company is not your typical Brewery. Besides brewing up barrels of delicious Craft Beer and having a full tasting bar, we offer our guests other amenities as well.     If you are an avid homebrewer or wish to jump into the hobby of homebrewing, we carry everything you need to brew your own Craft Beer or Soft Drinks at home...yes, Soft Drinks as well. There’s no tastier Root Beer than one you made yourself.     If you would like to brew your own Craft Beer or Soft Drinks, but don’t have the room to do it at home or just plain don’t want to own the tools & equipment, we have that covered as well. We have six separate stations where you can brew your own Craft Beer or Soft Drink right here at Wicks Brewing. This system is known as a Brew on Premise (or BOP). All you need to do is choose one of our recipes you would like to try and we will walk you thru the whole brewing process using one of our BOP stations and the ingredients from our stock.    Hungry?...Well, we can take care of that as well. We have an onsite, fully stocked kitchen. The delicious choices on our menu range from appetizers to salads to hardy meals and even desserts.     Make Wicks Brewing your next destination for fun & relaxation, you’ll be happy you did.
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Wed: 11:00 am - 10:00 pm  Thu - Sat: 11:00 am - 11:00 pm  Sun: 11:00 am - 6:00 pm

name: Wiseacre Brewery and Taproom
description: WISEACRE is a craft brewery committed to top quality, uniquely flavorful beer that appeals to passionate & progressive people through education & good times.  The brewery name comes from a term of endearment/scolding their grandmother used on the young troublemakers.  Brothers Davin & Kellan Bartosch dreamed up WISEACRE many moons ago & have been on an extensive quest procuring top-notch experience from around the globe to deliver the crunkest brewery possible in their groovy hometown of Memphis, TN.
hoursOfOperation: Thursday-Friday 4pm-8pm  Saturday 1pm-8pm

name: Working Man Brewing Company
description: Working Man Brewing is Livermore’s newest brewery, located at 5542 Brisa Street, just off of Vasco Road.  Getting the brewery up and running has been a labor of love for the owners, taking the better part of 18 months to turn the space into a full production brewery.  We are excited to finally bring our love of beer and commitment to quality to Livermore, the Tri-Valley, and beyond.    Our story is one of two independent breweries, Mt. Diablo Brewing and Working Man Brewing Company, coming together to work on one common goal.  Both companies were founded by award-winning home brewers who have a passion to bring high quality, well crafted beer that is fresh and local.  A chance meeting brought these working men together; a shared vision now combines forces under one name, Working Man Brewing Company.    The company’s brewers have each have spent years working to perfect great beer recipes.  Beer geeks at heart, both will tinker and tweak the ingredients until the product is just right.  The main goal always being to make a beer they could be proud to share and proud to drink. We never let a beer go out the door that we don’t believe in.

name: ZümBier

name: 38 State Brewing Company
description: We started out years ago brewing in our garage. Friends and family would always come by to hang out, drink our beer, socialize and watch whatever game was on. Soon our garage was filled with so many people we decided to find a bigger one and open it up to everyone! We took a chance and opened a nano-brewery and tasting room. Now we can offer our beer to current and future friends in our community! Visit our website for our beer menu, more info and updates. www.38statebrew.com    We're located in Littleton, Colorado. So whether you're a local or just passing through, please stop by, take a load off and sample some of our tasty brews. Trust us... you will not be disappointed! Cheers!!

name: 51st Ward Beer Company
description: We make unique beers the traditional way. Beer is our passion. We use only the highest quality ingredients and make small batches to ensure that we supply our community with the purest, freshest, highest quality beer possible. Fresh beer always tastes the best! Small scale, local distribution is our way of ensuring our product is in its prime when it gets to your glass. We have a number of staple beers plus we will be providing a rotating line of seasonal and specialty brews. As we say.....Great Beer, Born Here.

name: 7 Hermits Brewing Company
description: Brewpub in Eagle Ranch  We carry wine, spirits, guest beer, and of course our own.  Beer styles range from easy drinking summer pils, to outrageous hop bombs. There's a style for everyone here.     Food is a lighter, healthier fare including unique flat breads, salads, and cool snacks. Nothing deep fried here.

description: A purveyor of fine hand crafted ales.

name: Aslan Brewing Company
description: Aslan Brewing Company is a local microbrewery committed to pushing the boundaries of craft beer while preserving the purity of brewing tradition. We only use the finest certified organic ingredients the Pacific Northwest has to offer, creating some of the cleanest and most unique brews in the market today. Truly dank brew; Pride of the Organic Northwest.

name: Beech Mountain Brewing Co.
description: The newest craft brewery in Western North Carolina has opened in the Alpine Village at Beech Mountain Resort. Beech Mountain Brewing Co. has the capacity to brew up to 100 gallons per day and will be open year round to serve skiers, snowboarders, mountain bikers and other resort visitors.  The brewery features three distinct ales created on-site, with consulting from award-winning brewer Will Young of Blind Squirrel in nearby Plumtree. Heading the list of beers is the 5506 Pale Ale, followed by the Liberty and Yard Sale Ales. Patrons may purchase these high-quality craft beers by the pint or the growler. Flight tastings are also available, along with brewery tours, which include a pint and a keepsake glass.    "The brewery is yet another amenity added to the resort as part of our effort to become a year-round destination,” said Ryan Costin, general manager. “With the growing popularity of craft beer in North Carolina, we believe our customers will enjoy the experience."
hoursOfOperation: Thursday through Sunday. Please call ahead for hours of operation

name: Blue Spruce Brewing
description: Brewer, Rick Kane has been brewing beer since the early 90's. After brewing so long he decided to go to school and get a degree in Beer Engineering, which fit perfectly with his science teaching credential. His plan is to have 8-12 beers on tap, along with a couple of local guest taps.   The restaurant will feature taco shop mexican food. There will be appetizers that pair perfectly with beer, along with some sandwich and salad options.   We know that Highlands Ranch and Centennial have been waiting for a local brewery to call their own. Hold on tight, here we come!
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Wed: 3:00 pm - 9:00 pm  Thu: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm  Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 11:00 pm  Sun: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm

name: Bombshell Beer Company
description: Bombshell Beer Company’s 5,840 sq. ft building is conveniently located in the heart of Holly Springs within the Omni business park located off N.Main St. The building will house the production brewery, lab and a 1400 sq. ft. tasting room.  Our brewery features a custom designed 15 BBL steam fired brewhouse manufactured by SMT Food and Beverage Systems of Stokesdale NC. Our equipment is crafted by US workers and made of US stainless steel, a key factor of why we selected SMT as our equipment manufacturer. Supporting American workers and American Industry was important to the Bombshell founders.  Bombshell’s brewhouse features a two vessel system consisting of a mash tun complete with rakes and steam jacket for step infusion mashing and a combination brew kettle/whirlpool. A thirty barrel hot liquor tank and dual stage high efficiency plate and frame heat exchanger round out Bombshell’s brewhouse system. Initially two 15BBL and one 30BBL multi zone jacketed fermentation vessels and a 30BBL bright tank will be utilized in the production of Bombshell’s high quality, craft beers.  We will showcase our hand-crafted beers to the public in a new 1400 sq. ft. tasting room scheduled opening is which is planned to be open to visitors in July. The tasting room will offer sample flights, pints, and beer to go in growlers and kegs. Brewery tours and private event programs will also be available.  Bombshell Beer is owned by Ellen Joyner, Michelle Miniutti and Jackie Hudspeth.

name: Brüeprint Brewing Company
description: The story of Brüeprint Brewing Company begins five years ago in a family kitchen in Holly Springs, North Carolina. It’s in the Wagner kitchen where Eric first combined his passion and talent for gourmet cooking with over 20 years of engineering expertise, specifically in treating water. Who knew that brewing delicious beer was so similar to the science of treating water? The process of releasing enzymes to break down starches into sugar and fermenting the sugar into alcohol and carbon dioxide is second nature to a water engineer, while balancing delicious flavor is what a gourmet cook strives for. Hence the “blueprint” for great beer was born! Eric’s unique combination of talents led the way for the one-of-a-kind, handcrafted beer, each as original as a fingerprint.    Better than a recipe, a brewing “blueprint” combines science and great culinary skill to create a Brüeprint.    It’s with this vision that we bring Apex its first handcrafted Brewery—Brüeprint Brewing Company. The Wagner family, that is Brüeprint, is dedicated to traditional social interaction while sampling delicious beer. Our hope is that you’ll rest your phone for a few minutes to have a real conversation, partake in or watch a game with friends, or take in a great band. Whatever your idea of connecting is, plan for a great time—grab a Brüeprint!
hoursOfOperation: Wednesday - Saturday   4 - 10 PM

name: Brutopia Brewery
description: Here at Brutopia, we aim to provide world-class beers influenced by a traditional brewery style, while also tapping into the rich diversity of artisan craft beers and amazing local products found in our state of Rhode Island. Our brews are inspired from these local crafts and we use only the finest and freshest hops & grains, leaving each beer bursting with sensational aromas & flavors to perfectl... See More
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Fri: 4:00 pm - 1:00 am  Sat - Sun: 11:30 am - 1:00 am

name: Buoy Beer Company
description: Buoy Beer Company - Astoria, Oregon...Here, one of the West’s most relentless rivers meets the wilderness of an entire ocean. The unstoppable meets the unyielding. And here, a community with grit and backbone make that meeting work.    The river that built a town is home for building this beer. A place where hard work and hustle matter; where the local color has seen a little weather; where the newest generation wasn't born yesterday.    This is beer with history to it; a story to unfold, a tale to be told. Brewed from this confluence of pride and place. New beer, with a few centuries under its belt. Beer you can savor and share. Made of a few pure ingredients and a whole lot of local flavor.    Just like the town it comes from.
hoursOfOperation: Monday - 4pm - 10pm  Tuesday - Closed  Wednesday - 4pm - 10pm  Thursday - 11am - 11pm  Friday - 11am - Late  Saturday - 11am - Late  Sunday - 11am - 10pm

name: Bur Oak Brewing Company
description: Brewed for those that share a connection with the people who originally embraced craft beers, Bur Oak Brewing Company delivers meticulously executed yet approachable, stylistic craft beers intended to bring communities together.

name: Brewery/Taproom
description: Based in Minnesota, Burning Brothers is one of only a handful of dedicated gluten-free breweries in the U.S. Our calling is to bring the freedom to drink beer back to everyone who is gluten-free and to push the envelope by bringing you flavors you've never tasted before.    We don’t use gluten-free filtering, gluten-free enzymes or any other gluten-free gimmicks. Instead we use only naturally gluten-free ingredients to create great tasting and unique craft beers.
hoursOfOperation: Thu:  4:00pm - 9:00pm Fri:  4:00pm - 9:00pm Sat:  2:00pm - 8:00pm

name: Butcherknife Brewing Company
description: Northwest Colorado's Production Brewery

name: Canton Brew Works
description: New nanobrewery and taproom coming to Canton, MI in 2014!

name: Chain Reaction Brewing Company
description: With every action there is a reaction. For us a strong foundation of dedication to trades such as mechanics, ironwork and carpentry was laid early in life. With the love of these trades the need to create was always a must and that is what brings us to this point of wanting to share our beers with the public. We never focus on pleasing just one style since we love just about all of them and while not every beer we brew will be the perfect student in its category it will be one that will get the craft beer loving palate craving more with each sip.

name: Clouds Brewing
description: A locally owned and operated brew pub

name: Comrade Brewing Company
description: Welkome to the Party.  That's the motto for Comrade Brewing Company in southeast Denver.  Comrade features "back-to-basics" beers and a tongue-in-cheek nod to Communism.  But the name actually celebrates the camaraderie the craft brewing industry has become known for.

name: Constantine Brewing Company
description: After a terrific couple years of construction and planning, Constantine now has a Brewery/Winery.     We will feature a daily BBQ plate, with rotating appetizers. Sunday features Hot Wings and Pizza! Everything is made here, the beer, the wine and all food from scratch featuring local ingredients wherever possible.   We have 6 handles, with a variety of ales on tap. "Laughing Leaves" Wines are by Char, and made with grapes from our vineyard, and a vineyard in Allegan. Also, fruit wines made with fruit from local suppliers, including Hunts raspberries.    Most weekends will feature Live music by local solo acts, and duos.
hoursOfOperation: Thursday and Friday 4-10, Saturday 4-11  Sunday 12-5

name: Crystal Ball Brewing Company
description: Crystal Ball Brewing Company is a microbrewery located at 1612 West King Street in West York, Pennsylvania. After years of planning and months of construction, this production facility is now open.     Using the finest and freshest ingredients possible, combined with traditional brewing techniques and the latest technology, our intent will be to produce world-class beer. Our brewers love good beer and know its social potential for creating and sustaining a tasteful social experience. Every batch will be carefully crafted with passion, vision, and fun. Our brews range from traditional offerings to the more experimental, for adventurous drinkers. With a great product, and community engagement, we see in our future the potential to become the largest production brewer of hand-crafted beer in the region. And while we cannot predict everything, we can make one guarantee. CBBC will make the best possible beer, with offerings that will appeal to all who Seek the Finest.

name: Crystal Lake Brewing
description: We love craft beer, and Crystal Lake Brewing is all about the beer. We love drinking great beers, we love making them, and we can't wait to share them with you. Our goal is simple, to produce world-­class beers right here in Crystal Lake.    Starting this summer, you'll be able to enjoy Crystal Lake Brewing Co. beer at restaurants and bars throughout Illinois, but we'd also like you to come visit us in person in our on-­premises tap room. Here, you can sample our beers in an open, relaxed space, then sit back and enjoy a pint or two of your favorite, all while admiring the brewhouse.    The Crystal Lake Brewing Co. is a production brewery, and we're totally focused on producing top-­notch beers. We won’t be serving any food in the tap room, but you'll be welcome to bring it in with you or order delivery from one of the nearby eateries. From time to time, expect to see a food truck parked just outside the front door, where you can grab a casual bite.    The tap room will always be pouring our best known beers, but you'll always find "pilot" brews, too. These unique beers will be brewed in smaller quantities and will be available only here at the brewery. Something new will always be on tap.    Of course, brewery tours will be offered, too.    Look for "CLB" beer at your favorite tavern or restaurant this summer, or at a local summertime festival. Don’t forget to come on in and visit us in the tap room. We’ll have a pint waiting for you. Cheers!

name: Declaration Brewing Company
description: Dedicated to constantly challenging what is possible in craft beer, Declaration Brewing Company will strive to write its own chapter in the celebrated history that humanity and beer share.  Through continual evolution of the status quo, Declaration Brewing Company aims to expand upon established craft beer culture, practices, and expectations.

name: Denver Pearl Brewing Company
description: Located in the Platt Park neighborhood near the University of Denver, Denver Pearl plans to offer five flagship and five seasonal beers.  "We want to take old styles and put creative new twists on them."

name: Doomsday Brewing Company
description: Doomsday Brewing Company is a premiere small batch craft brewery located in Vancouver, WA. We want to bring the beer we love to everyone. We make small batches of quality beer with an emphasis on local ingredients. Malt from the oldest malting company in the western United States, Great Western Malting Co, in Vancouver, WA. Hops locally grown in Yakima, WA from Hopunion and yeast from Wyeast Laboratories Inc in Odell, OR.

name: Dos Desperados Brewery
description: Dos Desperados Viven: We Will Live, We Will Enjoy Life

name: Draft Line Brewing
description: Draft Line Brewing Co. was founded by Scott Palmieri and Scott Wood.     Sharing a passion for great beer, we began like most home-brewers several years ago brewing five gallon increments in the Palmieri family kitchen. Soon enough we realized that we needed to make a lot more beer. The home-brew setup morphed into 40 gallon increments...     Once the operation began to resemble a nano-brewey we decided to forge ahead with creating a microbrewery in the heart of North Carolina.     We like getting friends together and having a great time. Let us share our vision for what a great beer can be -- stop by our taproom in historic Fuquay-Varina, NC, now open!
hoursOfOperation: Wed-Thurs: 4PM-10PM,   Fri: 4PM-11PM,  Sat: Noon-11PM,   Sun: 1PM-8PM

name: DuVig Brewing Company
description: DuVig Brewing Company opened May 17th. Onsite, we offer tastings and tours, sell growlers to the public, and supply our beer to CT restaurants and bars.

name: Eternity Brewing Company
description: A microbrewery in the works. We will brew craft beer in Howell, Michigan. :-)

name: Primary
description: Ryan and Christa Kilpatrick plan to combine their love of good books and good beer at Fiction Beer Company, which they'll open on the first floor of the Phoenix on the Fax apartment building in east Denver, a part of town that is desperately lacking in craft breweries.  Fiction will include a seven-barrel brewing system, six beers on tap and a patio out back.  The beer styles will be categorized into genres based on the couple's favorite works of fiction, including classics, like an IPA; mystery and adventure; and fantasy/sci-fi.  Opening July, 2014

name: Former Future Brewing Company
description: Former, meet Future.  It’s simple, really.  We take historical recipes, deconstruct them, and place our own futuristic interpretation into them.  We reconstruct them, but in ways you may not expect.  Our taproom displays our brewing process from laboratory to tap.  The Former Future staff is service and beer focused.  All of our friendly, down-to-Earth employees are certified by the Cicerone program and are card-carrying beer geeks.
hoursOfOperation: Wed-Thu 4:00pm-10:00pm  Fri 2:00pm-10:00pm  Sat noon-10:00pm  Sun 11:00am-10:00pm

name: Four Fathers Brewing, LLC
description: Not All Beers Are Created Equal
hoursOfOperation: Thursday 4pm to 9pm  Friday 4pm to 9pm  Saturday 12pm to 9pm  Sunday 11am to 6pm

name: Franklin Street Brewing Company
description: As a small batch craft brewery, we believe in providing a rotating range of styles of high quality beers that would not normally be available in the region. Each month we will offer six or more different styles of beer for your enjoyment.    With our 20 gallon system (and years of experience), our beers progressed from “drinkable” to award winning! Our IPA recipe won 2nd place in the Iowa State Fair home brewing competition in 2012 in the Imperial IPA category and 3rd place in the IPA category. Our Blonde Ale also took 3rd place in its category.

name: Brewpub
description: Delicious Food and Fermented Beverages.
hoursOfOperation: Wed - Thu: 3:00 pm - 10:00 pm  Fri: 3:00 pm - 12:00 am  Sat: 11:00 am - 12:00 am  Sun: 11:00 am - 9:00 pm

name: Galveston Island Brewing
description: A craft brewery in the Galveston - Houston area featuring onsite tap room showcasing classic beer styles from around the world!

name: Goldspot Brewing Company
description: Goldspot Brewing is in the Berkeley neighborhood, about a block from Regis University.  Named for the gold spot that symbolizes the sun on both the city and state flags, Goldspot features several core beers made on a seven-barrel system, including an IPA, an imperial oatmeal stout and a wheat beer, along with rotating seasonals.

name: The Brewseum
hoursOfOperation: The Brewseum is a brewpub celebrating the history of beer in Hawaii. Enjoy some of the best beers in Honolulu at an incredible one-of-a-kind spot!

name: Hoots Roller Bar & Beer Company
description: Let it be known that the HOOTS BEER CO. is a mysterious brotherhood which concocts blue collar brews of unmatched character. Combining beer’s old world elements with fair dosages of dark secrets, imagination, and old fashioned rock and roll, H.B.C. are boundless in ambition and highly attuned to Winston-Salem’s industrious spirit and local community. The faceless and nameless conjurers of HOOTS are hellbent on fulfilling one age-old prophecy: You will enjoy the beer you were born to imbibe.

name: VA Beach
description: We are a small brewery on the outskirts of Gig Harbor fueled by impulse. When the urge strikes, be sure to "Satisfy Your Impulse".

name: Innovation Brewing
hoursOfOperation: Mon: Closed  Tues - Thurs: 4:00pm - 11:00pm  Fri: 4:00pm - 12:00am  Sat: 12:00pm - 12:00am  Sun: 2:00pm - 11:00pm

name: Lake Norman Brewing Company
description: Lake Norman Brewing Company is a family owned and operated microbrewery located in Mooresville, NC. We specifically chose the name “Lake Norman” due to the Lake’s prominence and the vitality it represents to the population that thrives around it. Whether you love Lake Norman as your home or get-away, for the boating, the sunsets, the watersports, the swimming or the fishing, we are excited to be part of phenomenon known to the locals as   the “Lake Life”.
hoursOfOperation: Tuesdays and Thursdays 4 pm - 7 pm  Saturdays 2 pm - 8 pm

description: Lion Bridge Brewing Company is a 10-barrel brewery located on the property of the former Fritz’s Food Market at 59 16th Avenue SW (Czech Village in Cedar Rapids, Iowa).

name: Lowdown Brewery + Kitchen
description: LowDown is the culmination of 20+ years of professional brewing experience. LowDown owners Scott and Phil have won numerous awards, including accolades from The Great American Beer Festival.  We don’t just stop at great beer, we serve great food too.  We only serve the best seasonal menu items with quality ingredients.    LowDown understands what it means to give back. We know that we reside in a neighborhood many people call home. Making our neigborhood and everything around it better is part of our mission.    From our casual environment to educating our staff, we're redefining the brewery experience. At LowDown we're passionate about quality beer, great and sustainable food, and making memories with good friends.
hoursOfOperation: Sun-Thur: 11:00AM - 12:00AM  Fri & Sat: 11:00AM - 1:00AM

name: Lowercase Brewing
description: We’re a beer company.  We got our start in Seattle making stuff in our basement and seeing what our friends thought of it. After a little trial and a lot of error, the beer started to taste pretty good.
hoursOfOperation: Thurs/Fridays 4–9  Saturdays 12-8  Sundays 12-6

name: LTD Brewing Co.
description: Using an 8 barrel brewing system makes us one of the smallest production breweries in Minnesota.  We focus on providing constant innovation and imagination to the craft beer enthusiast. Having a small, flexible system allows LTD Brewing to challenge the taste-buds of people who dream for a great beer. We are not bound by a style of beer, ingredients or a predetermined idea of what a beer drinker would expect. We are committed to re-inventing the way beer is brewed and providing an experience, not a drink.
hoursOfOperation: Wed - 4:00pm - 10:00pm  Thurs - 3:00pm - 10:00pm  Fri - 2:00pm - Midnight  Sat - Noon - Midnight

name: Mexitaly
description: A fast casual restaurant specializing in fresh food served fast. NOT fast food. All of our food is made fresh on premise. Our goal is to have you say "that was the best_______ I've ever had". Hope to feed you soon!
hoursOfOperation: Mon - Sun: 11:00 am - 10:00 pm

name: Mu Brewery
description: We are a micro (Greek letter µ) brewery that is in the heart of the Aurora Cultural Arts District. We are very excited to be a part of this community. We are looking forward to doing several events in tandem with the fantastic Artists from all mediums in this area. So, whether you are looking for somewhere to cool off in the summer or warm up in the winter or going to any one of the shows around Downtown Aurora, please stop in and enjoy good beer and fantastic company.
hoursOfOperation: Thursday: 4pm - 10pm  Friday: 2pm - Midnight  Saturday: 10am - Midnight  Sunday: 10am - 10pm

name: Northport Brewing Company
description: Northport Brewing is Northport's oldest brewery. Located in the center of Northport, MI with an indoor lounge and bar, covered outdoor patio with stone fireplace. Our beers vary in style from classic to experimental with the intent of using as many local ingredients as possible from Leelanau County. Come visit us this summer and relax with a pint paired with a locally sourced appetizer, or fill a growler up to take on your boating adventures.
hoursOfOperation: Wed - Sat: 3:00 pm - 11:00 pm

name: Oasis Texas Brewing Company
description: Producing iconic, rustic beers in the heart of the Texas Hill Country

name: One World Brewing
description: One World Brewing is a small-batch hand-craft nano-brewery and ale house located at 10 Patton Ave in Downtown Asheville (in the basement beneath Farm Burger). We have a 1.5 Barrel system with 12 fermenters soon to be in constant rotation. There will be 10 taps at the ale house which will feature 6 of our flagship beers and 4 rotating taps offering a large variety of different beer styles from around the world, including local homebrewer recipes. Hoping to open our doors this spring!! Stay tuned for more!    Our mission at One World is to inspire our community and our region to participate and get involved with solutions to environmental and political issues that effect us all. Over a wide range of truly unique and delicious beers we can come together and figure out how to change the world for the better, one revolutionary idea at a time! "Positive Change Starts With You!"
hoursOfOperation: Wed - Sun: 4:00 pm - 12:00 am

name: Pleasure House Brewing
description: In the 17th and 18th centuries, pubs were just as important for social as for practical reasons. People met in pubs to share stories, news, ideas, and company over their pints. Today’s craft brewing industry is increasingly local, providing a chance to renew the community gathering role that pubs played in our past.     To that end, we are using local talent in every aspect of our business, from spent grain to art to tap handles to logo and t-shirt design; we will also make every effort to promote other local breweries and businesses.    We will focus on producing small batches of technically-great, full-flavored ales that infuse pleasurable twists into classic styles… and sometimes blow style guidelines out of the water. It is also our intention to serve 4-5 categories of beer (I/IPA, Hoppy, Belgian, Malty, and Seasonal taps) but to continually rotate the specific beers served in each category so that we provide a new drinking pleasure on almost every visit.    At Pleasure House Brewing, we thrive on the idea of staying connected to the people who drink our beer!

name: Right Proper Brewing Company
description: Right Proper Brewing Company will be a locally owned neighborhood brew pub in a Washington DC neighborhood    Washington, DC, needs at least two things: more affordable neighborhood restaurants, and at least one locally owned brewpub.   Our objective is three-fold: We want to create a neighborhood gathering place that makes and serves well-priced delicious food and amazing fresh beer; we want to help our neighborhood thrive by investing in the community and its residents; and we want to anchor Washington, DC on the map as a destination for craft beer. Our business will invest in the growth and development of our employees as well as of our community.    We’ll take an innovative approach to small scale, “yeast-forward” craft brewing to produce artisanal ales and lagers in a comfortable, expertly designed casual old-world tavern. Serving fresh beer and affordable, high-quality American food, Right Proper will be a focus of pride for its neighborhood.
hoursOfOperation: TUESDAY - THURSDAY: 5PM - 11PM  FRIDAY - SATURDAY: 5PM - 12AM  SUNDAY: 5PM - 10PM  MONDAY: CLOSED

name: River's Edge Brewing Co.
description: River's Edge is Milford, Michigan's, microbrewery and gathering place! We're located in a distinctive building on the Huron River and across from downtown's Central Park. We'll be providing several delicious craft beers on tap, as well as cask-conditioned ales, and a selection of our house-made wine! Come on in and pull up a chair at our bar or a seat on our patio overlooking the park and river. We're looking forward to seeing you!

name: Rök House Brewing Company
description: Created by Co-Owners Lars Bennett, Brandy Friday, Mark Heffernan, and Sue Heffernan, Rök House Brewing Company is pleased to be finally serving you, our loyal Rökmeisters, the craftiest brews we can muster!
hoursOfOperation: Thu:  4:00pm - 9:00pm Fri:  2:00pm - 9:00pm Sat:  1:00pm - 9:00pm Sun:  1:00pm - 6:00pm

name: Sisyphus Brewing
description: Craft beers, brewed without a purpose, for a greater purpose. One need not imagine Sisyphus happy, especially when his stomach is filled with beer.

name: Small Batch Beer Company
description: Small Batch Beer Co. is a brewery and handcrafted cocktail bar in downtown Winston-Salem, NC. Soon to be located in the Kopper Kitchen building, our goal is to give every patron a unique taste and experience each time they come through the door.

description: Evanston brewpub and smokehouse. Craft beer, wood fired pizza, and Texas inspired BBQ. Reservations strongly encouraged.
hoursOfOperation: Tue:  4:00pm - 12:00am Wed:  4:00pm - 12:00am Thu:  4:00pm - 1:00am Fri:  4:00pm - 1:00am Sat:  4:00pm - 1:00am Sun:  4:00pm - 11:00pm

name: Snowbank Brewing CO
description: A departure from the traditional, Snowbank Brewing focuses on innovation and a passion for the Colorado lifestyle.

name: Stem Ciders
description: At Stem Ciders, we are committed to creating ciders of the highest quality that honor the purity and complexity that is inherent to the apple. We can’t wait to introduce you to your perfect cider match. We are dedicated to reviving the cider tradition, which goes far beyond what you enjoy in your glass. We hold our growers in the highest regard, and by fostering relationships with them we reward their hard work and promote the regrowth of heirloom apple cultivation. We love our home-base in Denver, and embrace the Colorado lifestyle that makes us lug a bottle to share up a mountain to enjoy a drink with a view. Most importantly, we love nothing more than seeing that smile on your face when you have your first sip of one of our crisp, refreshing ciders.
hoursOfOperation: Wed–Thu: 4pm–10pm  Fri: 4pm–11pm  Sat: Noon–11pm  Sun: Noon–6pm

name: Smithfield
description: Smithfield, VA    It will be the first brewery in Western Tidewater that produces European-inspired craft beers, using locally-raised hops and grains when possible. The tasting room will have a European flare, giving our guests a relaxing, family-friendly place to enjoy their favorite ales, lagers and stouts.    Storm Forge's tasting room is hoping to achieve Gemütlichkeit, a German word that refers to a situation that induces a cheerful mood, peace of mind with connotation of belonging and social acceptance, coziness and unhurry.

name: Brewery
description: The Brew Gentleman Beer Company is a microbrewery located in the historic steel town of Braddock, PA. Our goals are to create an ambitious variety of high-quality beers, operate a comfortable taproom and lounge in which to serve them, and to be a part of the ongoing reinvention of Braddock.

name: Tin Whiskers Brewery and Taproom
description: The three founders of Tin Whiskers Brewing Co., LLC are George Kellerman, Jake Johnson, and Jeff Moriarty. They first met in 2005 while going to the University of Minnesota for bachelor degrees in Electrical Engineering. Over time, they all worked together as hardware design engineers for a small engineering services company specializing in RF-centric products. Being young engineers working downtown Minneapolis, they attended various happy hours together. It quickly became clear that they all really loved craft beer and were very intrigued with the science of the brewing process.    Jake and Jeff are the two brewers of the company who designed and honed the recipes. They got their start in 2006 brewing extract kits on Jake's Mom's kitchen stove much to her chagrin. (A few boil-overs did occur on her stove, whoops!) They brewed countless extract kits until in 2010, when after touring Surly and Flat Earth, they were inspired to turn their passion (like the founders of those breweries) into a business. From that point forward it has been all grain brewing and loving it. Nowadays, Jake focuses on the brewing aspect of the business while Jeff focuses on the brewing as well as the business side of the operation.    George, in the early years, was a force within the brewery by helping out at every brew session and providing needed muscle for cleaning and moving material around the brewhouse. He focused a lot on the quality of our beer and pushed us to design better more complex beers. He has moved on to be in charge of our online presence including developing our own beer wiki engine.
hoursOfOperation: Wednesday: 4-10PM  Thursday 4-10PM  Friday 3-11PM  Saturday 12-11PM

name: Top Rung Brewery
description: Top Rung Brewing is a 10 barrel production brewery with tasting room at the brewery. Top Rung Brewing is a destination for craft beer drinkers to enjoy their beverage and view a production brewery facility. Our tasting room is family friendly and while we will only offer snacks, we partner with local food vendors and food trucks as well as allow patrons to bring in their own food of their choice or have it delivered. Top Rung Brewing.....bringing quality craft beer to Lacey.
hoursOfOperation: Fri - Sat: 2:00 pm - 9:00 pm

description: Northern Michigan's Microbrewery located just north of Harbor Springs on the beautiful and scenic M119 (Tunnel of Trees Scenic Byway).

name: Main Location
description: Wolfe Brewing Company has just opened in Pagosa Springs Colorado. Hand-crafted micro beers brewed on-site. Full menu available as well. Open 11am daily.
